languages.text: {n}Ульфар практически выплевывает:{/n} "Инквизиция! Крысы, облюбовавшие дом Всеотца и правящие им в отсутствие хозяина. Трусы, последние в бою, но первые на военном совете. Мы видели, чего они стоят в Месяцы Позора".

"The Inquisition! Pah!" {n}Ulfar nearly spits out the words.{/n} "Rats scurrying around the Allfather's house and ruling it in the master's absence. Cowards, they are. The last into battle, but the first on any war council. We saw what they were worth in the Months of Shame."
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар практически выплевывает:{/n} "Инквизиция! Крысы, облюбовавшие дом Всеотца и правящие им в отсутствие хозяина. Трусы, последние в бою, но первые на военном совете. Мы видели, чего они стоят в Месяцы Позора".

traits.locale_text: "The Inquisition! Pah!" {n}Ulbrig nearly spits out the words.{/n} "Rats scurrying around the Allfather's house and ruling it in the master's absence. Cowards, they are. The last into battle, but the first on any war council. We saw what they were worth in the Months of Shame."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “审判庭！呸！”{n}乌尔法几乎啐出了这句话。{/n}“那群臭老鼠，在全父的房子里乱窜。主人不在，他们就以为自己才是主人。他们是一群孬种，在战场上总是最后一个露面，但在战争委员会里却总是第一个窜出来。耻辱之月的那段日子，已经让我们看清了这些家伙都是些什么货色。”
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition! Pah!" {n}Ulfar nearly spits out the words.{/n} "Rats scurrying around the Allfather's house and ruling it in the master's absence. Cowards, they are. The last into battle, but the first on any war council. We saw what they were worth in the Months of Shame."

traits.locale_text: “审判庭！呸！”{n}乌尔法几乎啐出了这句话。{/n}“那群臭老鼠，在全父的房子里乱窜。主人不在，他们就以为自己才是主人。他们是一群孬种，在战场上总是最后一个露面，但在战争委员会里却总是第一个窜出来。耻辱之月的那段日子，已经让我们看清了这些家伙都是些什么货色。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¡La Inquisición! ¡Bah!». {n}Ulfar prácticamente escupe las palabras.{/n} «Ratas que corretean por la morada del Padre de todas las cosas y la gobiernan en ausencia de su verdadero señor. Un montón de cobardes, eso es lo que son. Los últimos en entrar en combate, pero los primeros en cualquier consejo de guerra. Ya vimos de qué pasta están hechos durante los Meses de la Vergüenza».
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition! Pah!" {n}Ulfar nearly spits out the words.{/n} "Rats scurrying around the Allfather's house and ruling it in the master's absence. Cowards, they are. The last into battle, but the first on any war council. We saw what they were worth in the Months of Shame."

traits.locale_text: «¡La Inquisición! ¡Bah!». {n}Ulfar prácticamente escupe las palabras.{/n} «Ratas que corretean por la morada del Padre de todas las cosas y la gobiernan en ausencia de su verdadero señor. Un montón de cobardes, eso es lo que son. Los últimos en entrar en combate, pero los primeros en cualquier consejo de guerra. Ya vimos de qué pasta están hechos durante los Meses de la Vergüenza».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「異端審問庁！ハッ！{n}ウルファーは吐き捨てるように言った。{/n}「全知の父の屋敷をうろつき回り、主人が不在の間に屋敷を支配するネズミだ。臆病者だ。戦いに参加するのは最後だが、軍議に参加するのは最初だ。我々は、嘆きの月日で奴らがどういうものかを見たのだ」
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition! Pah!" {n}Ulfar nearly spits out the words.{/n} "Rats scurrying around the Allfather's house and ruling it in the master's absence. Cowards, they are. The last into battle, but the first on any war council. We saw what they were worth in the Months of Shame."

traits.locale_text: 「異端審問庁！ハッ！{n}ウルファーは吐き捨てるように言った。{/n}「全知の父の屋敷をうろつき回り、主人が不在の間に屋敷を支配するネズミだ。臆病者だ。戦いに参加するのは最後だが、軍議に参加するのは最初だ。我々は、嘆きの月日で奴らがどういうものかを見たのだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Die Inquisition! Pah!" {n}Ulfar spuckt die Worte beinahe aus.{/n} "Ratten, die im Haus des Allvaters umherhuschen und es während der Abwesenheit des Hausherren beherrschen. Feiglinge sind sie. Als Letzte im Kampf, aber als Erste in jedem Kriegsrat. In den Monaten der Schande haben wir gesehen, was sie wert sind."
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition! Pah!" {n}Ulfar nearly spits out the words.{/n} "Rats scurrying around the Allfather's house and ruling it in the master's absence. Cowards, they are. The last into battle, but the first on any war council. We saw what they were worth in the Months of Shame."

traits.locale_text: "Die Inquisition! Pah!" {n}Ulfar spuckt die Worte beinahe aus.{/n} "Ratten, die im Haus des Allvaters umherhuschen und es während der Abwesenheit des Hausherren beherrschen. Feiglinge sind sie. Als Letzte im Kampf, aber als Erste in jedem Kriegsrat. In den Monaten der Schande haben wir gesehen, was sie wert sind."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « L'Inquisition ! Peuh ! » {n}C'est tout juste si Ulfar ne crache pas ces paroles.{/n} « Des rats qui fourmillent dans la maison du Père de Tous et qui commandent en l'absence du maître. Des lâches, tous autant qu'ils sont. Les derniers à partir au combat, mais les premiers à s'asseoir au conseil de guerre. On a bien vu ce qu'ils valaient lors des Mois Honteux. »
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition! Pah!" {n}Ulfar nearly spits out the words.{/n} "Rats scurrying around the Allfather's house and ruling it in the master's absence. Cowards, they are. The last into battle, but the first on any war council. We saw what they were worth in the Months of Shame."

Peuh ! » {n}C'est tout juste si Ulfar ne crache pas ces paroles.{/n} « Des rats qui fourmillent dans la maison du Père de Tous et qui commandent en l'absence du maître. Des lâches, tous autant qu'ils sont. Les derniers à partir au combat, mais les premiers à s'asseoir au conseil de guerre. On a bien vu ce qu'ils valaient lors des Mois Honteux. »

languages.original_text: "The Inquisition! Pah!" {n}Ulfar nearly spits out the words.{/n} "Rats scurrying around the Allfather's house and ruling it in the master's absence. Cowards, they are. The last into battle, but the first on any war council. We saw what they were worth in the Months of Shame."

languages.text: "Engizisyon ha! Peh!" {n}Ulfar, neredeyse lafı ağzından kaçırıyordu.{/n} "Yücebaba'nın hanesinde dolaşan ve efendileri yokken kendilerini kral sanan sıçanlar. Korkaklar işte. Savaşa en son gelirler ama her savaş konseyinde baş köşeyi kaparlar. Utanç Ayları'nda neye layık olduklarını gördük."
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition! Pah!" {n}Ulfar nearly spits out the words.{/n} "Rats scurrying around the Allfather's house and ruling it in the master's absence. Cowards, they are. The last into battle, but the first on any war council. We saw what they were worth in the Months of Shame."

traits.locale_text: "Engizisyon ha! Peh!" {n}Ulfar neredeyse lafı ağzından kaçırıyordu.{/n} "Yücebaba'nın hanesinde dolaşan ve efendileri yokken kendilerini kral sanan sıçanlar. Korkaklar işte. Savaşa en son gelirler ama her savaş konseyinde baş köşeyi kaparlar. Utanç Ayları sırasında neye layık olduklarını gördük."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
